parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.46

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns name of the current Steam profile. For currently chosen user profile name see [[profileName]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''profileNameSteam'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mySteamProfileName = [[profileNameSteam]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[profileName]], [[getPlayerUID]], [[name]]
</value></part></template></root>
